msIdentifier.repository: Private collection of Dr. Carl Heinz and Jutta Neukirchen
msIdentifier.idno: Private collection of Dr. Carl Heinz and Jutta Neukirchen 003

extent.note: Data on leaves dimensions taken from .

supportDesc.foliation: Foliation in pencil in the right bottom corner of the folio. This is the foliation used as reference in this record.
supportDesc.condition: Stains of water and dirt throughout the manuscript. The textblock has been reattached to the binding. The leather cover of the binding is partially cracked, rubbed off and damaged by insects.

handNote.seg: First one or two lines in the beginning of the text and text sections; numerals; punctuation marks; name of God, Mary, and angels; single letters and words.

decoNote.desc: A miniature of the in which David is playing his harp in front of the Holy Trinity and four Evangelists depicted as Four Beasts with inscriptions ገጸ፡ ንስር፡ ገጸ፡እንስሳ፡ ገጸ፡ ገጸ፡ አንበሳ፡. The miniature is coloured in yellowish brown colour.

item.desc: Partially erased text, probably a note on the purchase of the book.
item.q: ሥላሴ፡ ይን፡ ዳዊት፡ ባዛ፡ በ፫ ብር፡ዳ

item.desc: Erased text, probably a magic one.

item.q: ሠረቀ፡ መስከረም። አመ፡ አሚሩ፡ በርቶሎሜዎስ። ሠረ፡ ጥቅምት፡ በ፲ወ፪፡ ማቴዎስ ወንጌላዊ፡
item.note: The cited text is the incipit.
The cited text is the incipit.

item.desc: On the computation of the maṭqǝʿ

list.item: Text corrections in the margins throught the manuscript.

item.desc: Corrections, additions and crosses in green pen.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with tooled leather.

history.acquisition: The manuscript was acquired by Dr Carl Heinz and Jutta Neukirchen during their stay in Ethiopia in 1963-1966.
